abstract: Editorial highlights the improvements that have been made in the New Orleans public school system; argues that the success there shows that even a system with a long history of failure can improve by bringing in fresh ideas and strong instructional methods.
snippet: With fresh ideas and strong instructional methods, New Orleans is showing that even a school system with a long history of failure can improve.
lead_paragraph: With fresh ideas and strong instructional methods, New Orleans is showing that even a school system with a long history of failure can improve.
